          <title>
            <string language="es">Celestino Mutis</string>
            <string language="en">Celestino Mutis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Celestino Mutis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Celestino Mutis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Celestino Mutis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Celestino Mutis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Θελεστηνο Mutis</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Actividad de investigación sobre la vida de Celestino Mutis. El alumno deberá realizar un informe y responder a una serie de preguntas, utilizando como fuente de información las direcciones recomendadas.</string>
            <string language="en">Research activity on the life of Celestino Mutis. The student must write a report and answer a series of questions using as information sources the recommended addresses.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Mutis</string>
            <string language="en">Mutis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschen Sie Aktivität auf der Lebensdauer von
Celestino Mutis. Der Kursteilnehmer muß einen Report schreiben 
und eine Reihe Fragen mit als Informationsquellen den empfohlenen 
Adressen beantworten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherchez l'activité la vie de Celestino Mutis.
L'étudiant doit écrire un état et répondre à une série de 
questions en utilisant comme émetteurs d'informations les adresses 
recommandées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquise a atividade na vida de Celestino Mutis. 
O estudante deve escrever um relatório e responder a uma série
das perguntas usando como fontes de informação os endereços 
recomendados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerchi l'attività sulla durata di Celestino 
Mutis. L'allievo deve scrivere un rapporto e rispondere ad una 
serie di domande usando come sorgenti di informazioni gli indirizzi 
suggeriti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερευνητική δραστηριότητα στη ζωή της Celestino 
Mutis. Ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να γράψει μια έκθεση και να 
απαντήσει σε μια σειρά ερωτήσεων χρησιμοποιώντας ως πηγές 
πληροφοριών τις συνιστώμενες διευθύνσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mutis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mutis</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
